content:
Email:  
From: Mia O’Connor  
Subject: Briefing Session Changed to 9:30 This Morning  

Dear Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I need to inform you that our briefing session originally planned for today has a new start time. We'll now be gathering online via Microsoft Teams, starting at 9:30 AM and ending at 10:00 AM, November 11, 2024.

To ensure a smooth start, please confirm your attendance and let me know if there are any issues or questions regarding accessing the session.

Your cooperation and prompt attention to this schedule change are greatly appreciated.

Best regards,  
Mia O’Connor

label.Subject: Briefint session changed to 9:30 this morning

content:
From: Tatiana  
Date: November 5, 2024  
Subject: CS 6320: Final Exam Time Confirmed for November 15th  

Hi Everyone,

I hope you're all doing well as we approach finals. I wanted to let you know that the time for our CS 6320 final exam has been set for Friday, November 15, 2024, and will start promptly at 2:00 PM. We will meet in-person at room ECSS 2.103 for the exam.

Please make sure to arrive a little early to settle down and have your student ID ready for verification. If you have any questions or concerns regarding the exam or the location, feel free to reach out to me ahead of time.

Looking forward to seeing everyone there and good luck with your preparations!

Best regards,
Tatiana

label.Subject: CS 6320: Final Exam time is fixed on 15th

content:
From: Thabo Mbeki  
Date: 2024-11-20  
Subject: Join Us for a Delightful Lunch Party with Thabo Today!  

Hello Everyone,

I hope you're all having a wonderful day! I’m excited to extend a warm invitation to a lunch party I’m hosting today, November 20th, from 11:15 AM to 1:00 PM. We'll be gathering in the Student Hall for some great food, good company, and enjoyable conversations.

This will be a relaxed and informal get-together, and it’s a fantastic opportunity to unwind and enjoy some time with friends and colleagues. No need to RSVP—just come as you are and bring along your cheerful spirit.

Looking forward to seeing many friendly faces there!

Best,
Thabo Mbeki

label.Subject: Join us for a delightful lunch party with Thabo today!
